verses.roman:
kṛṣṇa-mādhuryera eka svābhāvika bala
kṛṣṇa-ādi nara-nārī karaye cañcala

synonyms: kṛṣṇa—of Lord Kṛṣṇa; mādhuryera—of the sweetness; eka—one; svābhāvika—natural; bala—strength; kṛṣṇa—Lord Kṛṣṇa; ādi—beginning with; nara-nārī—men and women; karaye—makes; cañcala—perturbed.
translation: The beauty of Kṛṣṇa has one natural strength: it thrills the hearts of all men and women, beginning with Lord Kṛṣṇa Himself.
